ruleBookInfo.author: {{@@span.2@text}}
ruleBookInfo.init:
<js>
if (baseUrl.match(/http/)){
let base64 = java.base64Encode(baseUrl);
let result = `data:;base64,${base64},{"type":"url"}`;
java.put('url',result)
let url = java.base64Decode(base64);
java.ajax(url);}else{
java.ajax(java.hexDecodeToString(result))
}
</js>
ruleBookInfo.intro:
<js>
v = String(source.getVariable()).split(",");
x=v[0]
intro=` 
📖 书名：{{@@span.1@text##.*《|》}}
👤 作者：{{@@span.2@text##作者：}}
🔖 标签：{{@@div[style="line-height:2;"]@text##标签：}}
🕰 最新：{{@@.divbg@li.0@a@text}}
🏷 简介：{{@@.tabvalue.0@text##\s}}
⭐ 属性：
{{@@tbody.0@tr.1:2@td@text}}`
if(x>=1){
let pl = '\n­\n【✨评论✨】最新';
p=result.match(/bid\=(.*?)\'\,\s/)[1]||1;
pi=`{{getUrl()}}modules/article/reviews.php?aid=${p}&page=${x}`
po=java.ajax(pi)
r2=String(java.getString('#jieqi_page_contents>.c_row@html',po));
r2 = r2.replace(/<div class="c_subject"[\S\s]+?div>|<span class="fr"[\S\s]+?span>|回复：.+/g,'').replace(/<p[> ](.+)<\/p>/g,'\n­\n⛄【$1】');
result=intro+pl+r2
result=r2?result:intro
}else if(x<1){
let pl = '\n­\n【✨评论✨】最新';
r2=String(java.getString('#content>.c_row@html'));
r2 = r2.replace(/<div class="c_subject"[\S\s]+?div>|<span class="fr"[\S\s]+?span>|回复：.+/g,'').replace(/<p[> ](.+)<\/p>/g,'\n­\n⛄【$1】');
result=intro+pl+r2
result=r2?result:intro
}
</js>
ruleBookInfo.kind: .tabvalue@.hide.0@td.2:0:1@text##最后更新：|作品分类：|连载状态：
ruleBookInfo.name: {{@@span.1@text##.*《|》|\（.*\）|\(.*\)}}
ruleBookInfo.tocUrl:
<js>
p=result.match(/bid\=(.*?)\'\,\s/)[1]||1;
let pi=`{{getUrl()}}read/${p}.html`
let base64 = java.base64Encode(pi)
result = `data:;base64,${base64},{"type":""}`;
</js>

ruleContent.replaceRegex: ##.*本站发布页.*|.*手机请访问.*|.*地址发布页.*|.*书架分类.*|地址发布页.*|.*调出设置选.*|左右翻页阅.*|第(.*?)章.*|八叉|书库|8xsk|org|83.*\.xyz|.*地\`\`\`址.*|５X６X７.*|.*地址邮箱.*|

ruleExplore.author: td.2@text
ruleExplore.name: a.1@text

ruleSearch.author: .c_tag.0@span.1@text
ruleSearch.bookList:
<js>
java.setContent(cache.get('urlss') );
cache.delete('urlss');
let r1 = java.getString('#content .blockcontent@text');
if (r1.includes("错误原因")) {java.longToast(r1);result=[];}
else {
result = java.getElement('#jieqi_page_contents .c_row||#jieqi_page_contents tr');
}
result
</js>
ruleSearch.name: .c_subject@a.0@text##.*《|》

searchUrl:
<js>
v = String(source.getVariable()).split(",");
x = v[1];
let url = `${getUrl()}modules/article/search.php`;
try {{
	url +=	`?searchkey=${key}&searchtype=all&page=${page}`
	ss = java.get(url,{	'user-agent': ua});
				}
code = ss.statusCode();
if (code == 302) {
	ss.header("location");
	}
	else if (code == 200) {
	cache.put('urlss', ss.body());
	url=`data:;base64,${java.base64Encode(getUrl())},{'type':''}`;
	}else if (code == 502) {
		java.toast('\n'+'👻ip被拉黑了👻')
}
	}catch(err) {
		java.log('💔访问出错💔')
		java.toast('\n💔访问出错，请换接口💔')
	}
</js>
